nodes.text: Nerf steak stew was a stew made from nerf steak. It could be served chilled, and packaged in a can. Ben Skywalker ate a can of this stew on Ziost, during his mission to retrieve the Amulet of Kalara for Jacen Solo.
Minced nerf stew was one of the meals served to Grand Army of the Republic clone troopers.
